system.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user becomes Transient 1, and ends their activation. While in this state, they have +6 EVA stages.
Resolution: On their next activation, the user freely moves up to twice the Movement Score of their choice and attacks with and resolves Quantum Leap. This attack ignores [Shield] effects.

actions.name: Quantum Leap
actions.description:
